title: JAM Session _1314 How Notepad Can Help You.pdf

pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Lee Williams III  Texarkana College  Saturday, June 4, 2016  Notepad Unleashed: Can Notepad Help? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Texarkana College Background     Found in 1927     Never had documented admissions communication plan     School has only had THREE Student Information Systems [SIS]  •   Homegrown  •   Banner  •   Jenzabar Ex [Current]     ALWAYS has had a very traditional approach to student communication  •   US Postal Service  •   Phones  •   Minimal E - Mail and Text Usage © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Needed a good way to track applicants, admitted, and registered students     Encouraged students from the START to CHECK E - MAIL     We use Apply Texas as our primary source for students to complete applications     Good System in place to communicate with Financial Aid  •   Stages Help for US     Wanted to increase the level of communication with students  •   Phone  •   E - Mails  •   Text  Texarkana College Background © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Applicant at TC   Admitted at TC  Advised and  Registered at TC   FAFSA or Cash for TC  PAID and Matriculating  at TC [GOAL]  Our Process © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Setting up Notepad and the Communication Toolbox requires EVERYONE  •   Recruiters  •   Application Specialist  •   Registrar and Advisors  •   Information Technology  •   Module Managers     ALWAYS work with the end in mind     Set - up can be as detailed or streamlined as YOU Like     Reflection of YOU     Get Buy - In from your TEAM [recruiters and admissions team]  •   Assign Counselors [assigned by service area school]  So...Let’s TALK about SET - UP © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     We set up our stages based off student candidacy type     200 STAGES are   APPLICANT     600 STAGES are   ADMITTED  •   200/600 = First Time Freshman  •   210/610 = Transfer  •   220/620 = Transient [Guest]  •   230/630 = Dual Credit  •   240/640 = Early Enrollment  •   250/650 = International  •   260/660 = Returning  So...Let's TALK about SET - UP © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     All of our stages in MAINTAIN CANDIDACY are tied to ACTION LIST     We have ACTION LIST for our 200 STAGES and our 600 STAGES     ACTION LIST = ACTION     ACTIONS for our 200 STAGES  •   200 STAGES ACTIONS     E - Mail after application is received and processed in Jenzabar within 24 hours     TEXT Message     Phone call after E - Mail and Text within 48 hours [personal touch]     Another E - Mail after 14 Days if missing items are not received     TEXT Message     All communication is tracked through notepad/when items went out     YOU CAN re do/re add ACTION LIST or just the ACTION  So...Let's Talk about ACTION SET - UP © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  So...Let's TALK about ACTION LIST SET - UP © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  So...Let's TALK about ACTION SET - UP © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     ACTIONS for our 600 STAGES  •   Phone Call congratulating them on acceptance  •   E - Mail congratulating them on acceptance     TEXT Message Acceptance  So...Let's TALK about ACTION SET - UP © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     February 2016 we started sending information to graduates through notepad     Stages are set - up to reflect flow of students  •   100   –   Application Received  •   300   –   Student qualifies to graduate  •   400   –   Student qualifies to graduate and will participate in ceremony  •   50   –   Completed all coursework  •   900   –   Doesn’t meet graduation requirements     Online application through Jenzabar to streamline graduation process  •   Automatic Response in attention to Application Received e - mail     No Action List with GRADUATION just ACTION     ONLY uses ACTION because we do not have multiple functions within the stage  Graduation is NOW apart of Notepad © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     The Daily Procedures in the AD module at   TC   ARE NOT run automatically  •   Always want to verify application process and stage assignment  •   REMEMBER! Your stage assignment is the trigger for the ACTION LIST  •   Daily document processing...I need the MAIL.     Daily Procedures are RUN once a day     Once Daily Procedures are RUN, the ACTIONS are unpacked  •   System gives you message to mark actions as complete     ACTION LIST and ACTIONS CAN BE inactivated through notepad for that student  account  So...I want to RUN DAILY PROCEDURES © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Notepad View © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Notepad is our FRIEND © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Missing Item E - MAIL © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Acceptance E - MAIL © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  To - Do LIST © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Stages for Graduation © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     We wanted to communicate the importance of   TRANSCRIPTS ,   MENINGITIS ,   College  101 ,   STUDENT ID # ,   E - MAIL, FAFSA,   and   ADVISING     We wanted things date stamped in our SIS and Electronically     We wanted students to have a personal touch     We wanted to be REALISTIC with our ACTIONS     We love dragging the note icon into PLAY [documentation is key]     Make your ACTIONS a true reflection of the institution     Each of our communications are personalized  •   Missing ITEMS  •   NAME  •   Student ID  So...What’s IMPORTANT to YOU? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Make sure you work with your information technology to keep them looped in  •   Cross departments  •   Update e - mails and text     Be able to track that information is going out correctly  •   BCC on e - mails and text     Make sure your correspondence is coded correctly  •   Maintain candidacy missing items  •   Students name and e - mail [personal]  •   Phone numbers are coming in correctly     Make sure you stay connected with your institutions brand/logo     Communication is KEY  TEAM Information Technology © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Our Action List and Actions continue to change     Get EVERYONE involved     Track and monitor the progress     Make sure you add and maintain your Counselor ID’s     Always keep your ears open for updates  FINAL THOUGHTS and QUESTIONS © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Lee Williams III  Director of Admissions and Recruitment  Texarkana College  903.823.3106  lee.williams@texarkanacollege.edu  Tweet Me: @lwiii  Evaluations through JAM Mobile Application  Contact Information
